title: how can I report this
body:
How can I report these guys please advise.

This premade FF on final push to kill enemy nexus.  Its not funny, its not a good meme, these dudes should get banned this is actually the bullshit that ruins others fun.  Trolls, flame and grief.   I dont want to be matched with premade 4s if this is the kind of shit I am on the receiving end.  Guarantee you if I had typed a single word Id have been 4x reported because hehe xd.  

https://imgur.com/fVD3kYP

Actually it does, the point of norrmals and the point of ranked are different if a premade of 4 choose to ff because thats their idea of fun they chose to ff it doesnt hurt the last person besides the first win of the day and xp gain. Rules apply to all queues but you cant queue up as 4 in any ranked queue. Its either all or 3, So that isnt fair to the 4 playing either to say this just toxic behavior. Otherwise id ask how is this toxic behavior and pointt me to a "rule" that is against this behavior.

how many times have you actually encounter this?  Do you know 100% this is premade 4?  It's just normal.

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IgRn3xtM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-21T03:43:33.474+0000)
>
> how many times have you actually encounter this?  Do you know 100% this is premade 4?  It's just normal.

This isn't the first time.  Yes they told me they were premade, which is in the chat logs.  "Its just a normal" is a terrible reason to downplay this incredibly toxic behavior.
Then report them and move on.  I've had this happened to me once too.  I know I won that game.  That's all it matters.

im not sure if that is a rulebreak.

you can write a ticket to the support, but (once again) i have yet to see any evidence that this has any impact at all.
Deliberately surrendering an obviously won game (ex: you're on Nexus and entire enemy team dead) has been punished before. It's best to submit a clear and concise support ticket for things like this.

well you say that, but it seems that NOONE can provide me with evidence that this actually does something. meanwhile i could show my history of over 20 tickets in 1 season reporting the same player over and over for massive racism back in the old client chatrooms and this person is still playing.

Tickets are not used for behavior handled by the IFS. Period.

This is not a behavior handled by the IFS.

Do the following things:

1. Open a ticket at support detailing what happened  [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Be polite about it and explain in detail what they did(here you also include the match history). Also, explain that you can see from his/her match history that they are still playing.
2. Open a post on the boards detailing the complaint (you did that).
3. Move on, but repeat if needed.

It might work, it might not, but it is worth the shot.

Honestly I hate getting matched with premade 4s. From my experience more often than not it just ends in a solo player getting griefed one way or another. Not always, obviously, but pretty often. And there's rarely -if ever- anything done about it.
4x reporting is nothing that 1x reporting won't do, and you report them like any other troll.
